comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body:
You have a bad link to issue https://github.com/powershell/powershell/issues/4784

This isn't repro'ing for me

comments.author: dantraMSFT
comments.body:
It's possible its a server + domain joined issue. I haven't investigated it but it fails on my system consistently.
The issue is not that it is failing on my system but that we are not handling the COM exception and the process is getting shut down.  I've made a minor change to the issue's title and the description to ensure this is clearer.

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: Agree that the real issue is that we aren't handling the COM exception.  However, this PR doesn't address that.

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @dantraMSFT as we discussed, you should close this PR

comments.author: dantraMSFT
comments.body: Closing this PR; will work on a fix for the underlying issue, instead.
